scripts.test:coverage: cd client && npm run test:coverage; cd ../
scripts.dev: concurrently "NODE_ENV=dev npm run server" "npm run client" "java -jar goodreadsbookshelf-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"
scripts.stg: concurrently "NODE_ENV=stg npm run server" "npm run client" "java -jar goodreadsbookshelf-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"
scripts.prod: concurrently "NODE_ENV=prod npm run server" "npm run client" "java -jar goodreadsbookshelf-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar"
scripts.offline: concurrently "NODE_ENV=offline npm run server" "npm run client-offline"
